Benefits of Encapsulation

benefits of data encapsulation

  • protection of implementation (safety) : clients cannot directly access encapsulated

data

  • readability (understandability) : clients of interface does not need to know any

knowledge as to how the functions that describe the interface use encapsulated information

  • implementation independence : A change in implementation should not affect the

interface seen by the clients of a class. An encapsulated implementation provides the implementor freedom to change it without affecting the interface. i.e. how the clients use the interface is independent of the implementation
